info.title: Arcateched API
info.description: This document describes the API endpoints specified on an Arcateched server

id.title: UUID Primary Key
id.description: A UUID string that identifies an object

machine_data_model_scalars.title: Machine Data Model Scalar Values
machine_data_model_scalars.description: The scalar values contained in the machine_data model

name.title: Machine Name
name.description: The name to which the machine is commonly referred

modelNumber.title: Model Number
modelNumber.description: A manufacturer-supplied identification of the model of the machine

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: A unique manufacturer-supplied string that marks the machine

dateOfMfg.title: Date of Manufacture
dateOfMfg.description: The date of manufacture marked on the machine, if any

dateEnter.title: Date Entered
dateEnter.description: The date on which the machine data was enter into the database

dateExit.title: Date Exited
dateExit.description: The date on which the machine was removed from service, if any

playerCount.title: Player Count
playerCount.description: The number of players the game can accommodate simultaneously

occupied.title: Occupied floor space
occupied.description: A number representing the number of square feet a machine occupies

opState.title: Operational State
opState.description: A string that describes the operational state of the machine

machine_data_model_readonly.title: Machine Data Model UUID Fields
machine_data_model_readonly.description: These fields in the machine data contain UUID strings that link to other objects and are not directly writable

cKey.title: Cabinet Key Identifier
cKey.description: A UUID string that links to the 'cabinet key' object. The cabinet key is used to open the cabinet of the machine

sKey.title: Service Key Identifier
sKey.description: A UUID string that links to the 'service key' object.  The service key is used to open a service door on the machine.

gameZone.title: Game Zone Identifier
gameZone.description: A UUID string that identifies the object describing the physical space that the machine occupies

mfgUUID.title: Manufacturer Identifier
mfgUUID.description: A UUID string that links to an object in the contacts table, representing the manufacturer of the machine

timestamp.title: Timestamp Identifier
timestamp.description: A UUID string that links to an object in the timestamp table, representing an object that contains timing metadata

machine_data_model_1toMany.title: Machine Data Model One-to-Many Relational Fields
machine_data_model_1toMany.description: Fields that contain arrays of objects from other schemas.  These fields share relations with the Machine Data model

attachments.title: Related Attachments
attachments.description: An array of objects stored in the attachments table that are related to the specified machine_data object

comments.title: Related Comments
comments.description: An array of objects stored in the comments table that are related to the specified machine_data object

issues.title: Related Issues
issues.description: An array of objects stored in the Issues table that are related to the specified machine_data object

todo.title: Related Todo Items
todo.description: An array of objects stored in the todo table that are related to the specified machine_data object

machine_data_model_1to1.title: Machine Data Model One-to-One Relational Fields
machine_data_model_1to1.description: Fields that contain a single object from another schema. These fields share relations with the Machine Data model

cabinetKey.title: Cabinet Key Object
cabinetKey.description: An object stored in the keys table

serviceKey.title: Service Key Object
serviceKey.description: An object stored in the keys table

machine_zones.title: Machine Zone Object
machine_zones.description: An object stored in the machine_zones table

contacts.title: Manufacturer Object
contacts.description: An object stored in the contacts table

timestampObject.title: Timestamp Object
timestampObject.description: An object stored in the timestamp table that contains timing metadata

machine_data_model.title: The composed machine_data model
machine_data_model.description: The entire machine_data model composed of its constituent schemas
